text:
Please share with friends and fam who are hesitant to get their shot. We need broad #immunity to beat #COVID19, especially in vulnerable Black and brown communities. h/t @MGKnightMD 

My COVID-19 #Vaccine Experience: 28 Days to 95% Protection https://t.co/KeU8gD4NDS via @YouTube https://t.co/P32vCc0CGn
